ygData.msgSnippet: ahh..the cgs isn t a quest, it s a drop on a rare spawn in sol a......from what i ve heard, you can t use ANY magic on it, and better not let it get
ygData.messageBody:
ahh..the cgs isn't a quest, it's a drop on a rare spawn in sol
a......from what i've heard, you can't use ANY magic on it, and better
not let it get away.....that's all i know
